item.title: ECIS Blog
item.description: Founded in 1965, the Educational Collaborative for International Schools is a non-profit global membership organisation that supports schools in the areas of teacher development, leadership development, recruitment and human resources, governance and risk, complemented by grants and awards.

item.title: ECIS Webinars
item.description: Founded in 1965, the Educational Collaborative for International Schools is a non-profit global membership organisation that supports schools in the areas of teacher development, leadership development, recruitment and human resources, governance and risk, complemented by grants and awards.

item.title: TIE Online
item.description: Teachers and administrators share their experiences in international schools around the world
